articles.description: Here's the lay of the land when it comes to new COVID-19 cases in Oregon.
articles.content:
The Oregon Health Authority on Monday announced 178 new coronavirus cases and two deaths.
Where the new cases are by county: Baker (1), Benton (5), Clackamas (20), Coos (13), Curry (1), Deschutes (2… [+1808 chars]
